name: neglectfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not give enough care and attention to something or someone: The couple were accused of behaving neglectfully towards their four young children. The yard was a mess, with tools neglectfully left lying on the ground.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was clear that the old man had been treating the cat neglectfully as it was terribly skinny.The business had been run neglectfully since the previous owner sold it, and its future was now very uncertain.
